targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "pvPower" WHERE ("value"::field < 20000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "batteryPower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") * (-1) FROM "homePower" WHERE ("value"::field < 20000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") * (-1) FROM "chargePower" WHERE("loadpoint"::tag = 'Garage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") * (-1) FROM "chargePower" WHERE("loadpoint"::tag = 'Stellplatz') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "pvPower" WHERE ("value"::field < 20000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") *(-1) FROM "batteryPower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") * (-1) FROM "chargePower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") * (-1) FROM "homePower" WHERE ("value"::field < 20000) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "batterySoc" WHERE $timeFilter and value <= 100 GROUP BY time(5m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "vehicleSoc" WHERE ("vehicle"::tag = 'Tesla') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(none)
SELECT last("value") FROM "vehicleSoc" WHERE ("vehicle"::tag = 'Ioniq 5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(none)
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "pvPower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < 20000  GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)
SELECT integral("subquery") /3600 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT integral("subquery") /-3600 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value <=0 GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "homePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < 20000  GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)
SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "chargePower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)
SELECT integral("subquery") /3600 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(0)
SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "chargePower" WHERE("loadpoint"::tag = 'Garage') AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(0)
SELECT integral("value")  / 3600 FROM "chargePower" WHERE("loadpoint"::tag = 'Stellplatz') AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(0)
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "homePower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < 20000  GROUP BY time(15m) fill(0)
SELECT integral("value") /3600 FROM "pvPower" WHERE $timeFilter AND value < 20000  GROUP BY time(15m) fill(0)
SELECT integral("subquery") /-3600 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value <=0 GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(0)
SELECT integral("value") /3600000 FROM "pvPower" WHERE $timeFilter  and value < 20000 GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("subquery") /3600000 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT integral("subquery") /-3600000 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "gridPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value <=0 GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)

SELECT integral("subquery") /3600000 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "batteryPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value >=0 GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)

SELECT integral("subquery") /-3600000 FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS "subquery" FROM "batteryPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value <=0 GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
SELECT integral("value") /3600000 FROM "homePower" WHERE $timeFilter and value < 20000 GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value")  / 3600000 FROM "chargePower" WHERE ("vehicle"::tag = 'Tesla') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value")  / 3600000 FROM "chargePower" WHERE ("vehicle"::tag = 'Ioniq 5')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)
